dmca.title: Envision SBS envisions takedown of "hacker" sites
dmca.body:
Aug 16 06 02:25p	Envision SBS	[private]	p.l


Fax

www.envision-sbs.com


This fax is sent by:
Jonathan Defoy Co-President Envision SBS

Fax : [private]

Please give this fax to:
Attn: Google Legal Support DMCA Complaints

Fax : [private]

No. of pages (including this one): 3
Subject of this fax : Copyright Infringement Complaint
Envision SBS is a loyal Google AdWords client since 2002 Main account ID is: [private] Our Account Executive is [private]


To Whom It May Concern:

We discovered some hacker/pirate/download sites in Google that are giving free access to our Businessin-a-Box software that we are promoting with AdWords. Since those sites are present in the organic results, our conversion rate has lowered considerably. We tried to contact the operators of those sites several times but they simply ignored us... Please help us block those illegal sites ASAP.

Below is our official Copyright Infringement complaint.


Copyright Infringement Complaint (compliant with DMCA requirements)


1. The copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed:

Envision SBS's software application "Business-in-a-Box", which is proprietary and is being sold on the market since 2002. The software can be downloaded and bought at www.envision-sbs.com.


2. List of illegal sites where users can download a pirated copy of our software:

Search query:	business-in-a-box pro 
Infringing URL's:

rapidshared.org/index.php?t=item&id=8310
http://ddI2.com/download-Business-in-a-Box-Pro-full-version-with-crack-serial-keygen-136668.htm 
rapidshared.org/index.php?t=category&n=software&i=b


Search query:	business-in-a-box pro.exe 
Infringing URL's:

http://search.nnm.ru/?sq=%C8%ED%E2%E0%E9%F2%FB+GMAIL+%EE%F2+Google&page=9 http://nsys.by:8100/stats/search_200508.html
http://nsys.by:8100/stats/search_200512.html http://www.nsys.minsk.by:8100/stats/search_200404.html


Search query:	business-in-a-box pro.zip 
Infringing URL's:

http://full.blog.hr/arhiva-2005-10.2.html http://www.philka.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=1390&st=O http://www.bitenova.nl/search/x%20pro


Other illegal download sites found in Google:

http://www.business-in-a-box-pro.warez.full.download.crack.serial.ddl2.com/full/download/warez/crack/serial/Business-in-a-Box-Pro/download.php

http://www.download.ir/archives/2006/01/businessinabox.php http://rapidshared.org/index.php?t=item&id=8310 http://www.bitenova.nl/s/f5d7e2532cc9adl6bc2a41222d76f269 http://uploter.net/archive.php?page=234
http://forum.softlandir.com/showthread.php?p=6166#post6166

http://64.233.167.104/search?q=cache:8os8t_Fo9QkJ:katz.ws/page/4+business-in-abox+pro&hl=en&ct=clnk&cd=16


3. Complainant's contact information:

[private] Co-President / Envision SBS New York - Montreal

Tel: [private]
Toll Free: [private] Fax: [private]
Website: www.envision-sbs.com Email: [private]@envision-sbs.com

4. We are unable to provide information sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the webpages that contains infringing material as those sites are owned by hackers.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. Signature:
[signed]
[private] Co-President of Envision SBS

Thank you for your anticipated collaboration.
